verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Leo ni siku ya shangwe
ulimwenguni kote,
kwani mkombozi Yesu,
kafufuka mzima,
kaburini mle tena hayumo
ameshinda mauti.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wote natushangilie,
tumsifu Mwokozi wetu,
ameyashinda mauti.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ametutoa mashaka,
ametutia nguvu mpya,
ya kumpenda Mungu.
